snippet: Lawyers say Mary-Shea Sutherland inappropriately wooed the support of the donor at the core of the corruption case against Maureen McDonnell and her husband, Bob McDonnell, the former governor of Virginia.
abstract: Eighth day of corruption trial against former Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell focuses on Mary-Shea Sutherland, former chief of staff to Maureen McDonnell and key witness for the prosecution; defense lawyers for the former first lady argue that it was Sutherland, and not their client, who inappropriately wooed the support of John R Williams, donor at the core of the case.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers say Mary-Shea Sutherland inappropriately wooed the support of the donor at the core of the corruption case against Maureen McDonnell and her husband, Bob McDonnell, the former governor of Virginia.

headline.main: Eighth Day of Virginia Ex-Governor’s Trial Focuses on Role of His Wife’s Chief of Staff
headline.print_headline: Eighth Day of Virginia Ex-Governor’s Trial Focuses on Role of His Wife’s Chief of Staff
